short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds family names to take to the temple

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of searching for names to take to the temple? Does it get too hard or overwhelming? Your quest ends here! Our exceptional extension is designed to take your temple work to a whole new level. Picture this: Effortlessly uncover the forgotten ancestors eager to receive their sacred temple ordinances, and it's all at your fingertips.

With just a simple installation, you embark on an extraordinary genealogical journey. Visit your family tree on familysearch.org, and then, like magic, activate our extension. Select your preferences, whether you're seeking male, female, or both names, and prepare to be astounded. Hit that search button and let the extension take care of the rest - the excitement is in the details.

Behold as it presents you with a meticulously curated list of ancestors awaiting their temple blessings, and the best part? It also reveals your relationship to them! Our extension empowers you to make a profound impact, unlocking countless opportunities to take cherished names to the temple. After the extension unveils your ancestral treasure trove, please look at each ancestor to complete any record hints or look for potential duplicates.

We're always striving to enhance your experience, and your feedback is invaluable. If you have any thoughts or suggestions for improvement, please don't hesitate to email us. We're here to make your journey even more remarkable.

Important Note: This extension is an independent creation and not affiliated with familysearch.org in any way.
